thread.title: The View's Joy Behar Is Bringing a Late-Night Talk Show to TLC
thread.title_full: The View's Joy Behar Is Bringing a Late-Night Talk Show to TLC

author: TV Guide
title: The View's Joy Behar Is Bringing a Late-Night Talk Show to TLC
text: Posted Oct. 11, 2015 at 12:01 AM By TV Guide Posted Oct. 11, 2015 at 12:01 AM Â» Social News Look out, men of late-night, Joy Behar is starting up her own late-night talk show. Behar, who rejoined The View this season, will be hosting a weekly, half-hour talk show on TLC, Deadline reports. Late Night Joy will be filmed in the comedienne's New York apartment and has landed a five-episode starting line-up, with a guest list that includes her View co-host Sherri Shepherd , Don Lemon , Long Island Medium 's Theresa Caputo and comedian Colin Quinn . Late Night Joy is currently set to premiere on Wednesday, Nov. 4 at 11/10c, which will make Behar the only woman in late-night until January, when Daily Show correspondent Samantha Bee 's Full Frontal will premiere on TBS. (Unless you count Miss Piggy, whose "Up Late with Missy Piggy" airs on ABC's The Muppets .) Will you tune in for some Late Night Joy ? Video: Joy Behar says returning to The View means "a lot of therapy" By TV Guide
